items.title: Initiative
items.content: Determines the order in which players and enemies take their actions. Roll a d20 + your Dexterity modifier at the start of combat.

items.title: Surprise
items.content: Sneak up on enemies & surprise attack! Surprised creatures cannot act, move or take reactions during the first round of combat.

items.title: Attacking
items.content: To see if you hit a target, roll a D20 + STR or DEX modifier + Proficiency Bonus. This number needs to beat the target's AC. Typically STR for melee attacks and DEX for ranged attacks.

items.title: Damage
items.content: Refer to the weapon's statistics to determine its Damage Dice, a D4, D6, D8, D10 or D12, + STR or DEX modifier (depending on weapon).

content.label: Action
content.description: Your main action for the turn

content.label: Bonus Action
content.description: An additional smaller action if you have an ability that grants one

content.label: Reaction
content.description: One reaction per round, used on your turn or someone else's

content.label: Free Object Interaction
content.description: Draw a weapon, open a door, etc.

items.title: Critical Hits
items.content: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll, you score a critical hit. Double all damage dice for the attack.
